name: Church Church Revolution
description:
Sit! Kneel! Read & Sing! Greet your neighbor! Follow the prompts to make this week's service a success! Made in 60 minutes for #0hgame. Based on the drawn-out, almost dance-like synchronized group motions from the church services of my childhood.

Intended to be played with a Makey Makey if you're in an alternate controls kind of mood. Actual pews not required.

Controls
Kneel - Up
Sit - Down
Greet Neighbor - Left
Read & Sing - Right
